column4: I just installed ubuntu 8.04 64bit and encountering problems with "applications->add/remove..."...first it always asked me to reload the list of applications...now it doesn't even start anymore...what's wrong?
yoou might want to reinstall your package manager, go to system, administration and start synaptic
thanks, how's that package manager called?
i'm not sure of the name, i'd search package manager and see if it comes up
